min.name: min
min.label: Lower numeric bound of the measured range
min.help: Must be less than the maximum value, 0 if unspecified

max.name: max
max.label: Upper numeric bound of the measured range
max.help: Must be greater than the minimum value, 1 if unspecified

low.name: low
low.label: Upper numeric bound of the low end of the measured range
low.help: Must be greater than the minimum value

high.name: high
high.label: Lower numeric bound of the high end of the measured range
high.help: Must be less than the maximum value
